main event: A UFO was observed in Nakajori Village, Japan between 1946 and 1950. The object was pale white to yellow red in color and disappeared 1-3 minutes after observation, accompanied by a sound like thunder.
interesting points: The duration of the observation was 2-3/4 seconds.
The UFO was observed from the ground.
The altitude of the object was between 350-600 meters.
The report mentions that the case was not in [sic].
The sound heard after the object disappeared was described as similar to thunder.
